Articles.Content:
OK, you might have seen me on Steam's KSP forums posting pics and whatnot. I finally decided to make yet another login for another forum.

It seems the activity is better here than on Steam forums. So here I am.
Welcome to KSP forums! Good to have you. Anything you need, feel free to ask. Lots of intelligent people around here!

Welcome to the forums!

I'll second what Xiphos says. If you ever need help with anything or just want to learn more, feel free to ask questions, especially in the How To forums. I also try to maintain the Drawing Board (link in my sig), which has links to all sorts of different resources, including tutorials. Feel free to look around the forums and participate in any discussion that catches your eye.

Happy landings!
